thread.title: 18 Carrie Fisher Quotes From "Bright Lights" That Will Make You Smile
thread.title_full: 18 Carrie Fisher Quotes From "Bright Lights" That Will Make You Smile

author: Louis Peitzman
title: 18 Carrie Fisher Quotes From "Bright Lights" That Will Make You Smile
text:
View this image ›
HBO “It’s beautiful, but it weighs more than she does.”
ID: 10284998 2. On the silver lining of aging. HBO “That’s what’s good about losing your memory, is there’s so many surprises in the world.”
ID: 10284999 3. On proper bathroom decor. HBO “This is the bathroom. It has, as a lot of bathrooms should, a player piano in it.”
ID: 10285007 4. On classic portraiture. HBO “He looks like Ross Perot in red. Shia LaBeouf as a Dutch underage prostitute. And Richard Dreyfuss as a young girl wielding a rose. Now, this just happens to be probably an unhappy woman that looks like Kevin Spacey.”
ID: 10285011 5. On anatomical realities. HBO “They sold this on the internet as a Princess Leia sex doll. Maybe this. There’s no way of accounting for it.”
ID: 10285021 6. On family bonds. HBO “Family-wise, we didn’t grow up with each other, we grew up around each other. You know, like trees.”
ID: 10285030 7. On monetizing her celebrity. HBO “We are at a lap dance. A celebrity lap dance, which is where celebrities of all shapes and ages sign autographs for cash prizes. It’s sort of like going to a strip club, except they don’t stuff cash in your underwear.”
ID: 10285038 8. On her former father-in-law. View this image ›
HBO “He was just a mass of noises and monograms.”
ID: 10285050 9. And his interests. HBO “Nothing about him was interesting until we found out about the hookers.”
ID: 10285056 10. On hospitality. HBO “That’s the ultimate hostess. You’re offered water, soft drinks, oxygen.”
ID: 10285108 11. On the physical body in the afterlife. HBO “My question is, if you die when you’re fat, are you a fat ghost? Or do they go back to a flattering time?”
ID: 10285070 12. On her fitness regimen. HBO “After your exercise class, what you need to do is smoke a cigarette.”
ID: 10285085 13. On how celebrities age. HBO “I’ve seen Harrison and Mark over the years. You sort of run into one another in the cafeteria, the celebrity cafeteria. And they— you know, we all just look more melted.”
ID: 10285123 14. On virginity. View this image ›
HBO “My hymen was a burden to me.”
ID: 10285139 15. On competing with Elizabeth Taylor. HBO “If your competition to be best girl with you is Elizabeth Taylor, well, I don’t think I’m gonna do well with that one. But I think I’m funnier than Elizabeth Taylor.”
ID: 10285178 16. On always being on. HBO “We are always on a red carpet. We have red carpets at home, connecting our homes.”
ID: 10285155 17. On her financial future. HBO “I passionately, passionately am going to marry you while you’re sleeping tonight. And by the morning, I will have taken all your money.”
ID: 10285191 18. On getting a break. HBO “You know what would be so cool? To get to the end of my personality and just, like, lay in the sun.”
ID: 10285228 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
